data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Ball goes out of play for a Sporting goal kick.
In the minute 3, Tiago Tomas for Sporting gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Pacos Ferreira have a goal kick.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 4, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Matheus Nunes for Sporting who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Matheus Nunes has recovered and rejoins the match in Pacos de Ferreira.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 7, Pacos Ferreira's Douglas Tanque gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Fabio Verissimo awards Sporting a goal kick.
Ball safe as Sporting is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in high up the field for Sporting in Pacos de Ferreira.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 10, Luis Neto (Sporting) has received a first yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Sporting.
In the minute 12, Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pedro Porro gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sporting.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
In the minute 13, Important block from the Pacos Ferreira defence as Matheus Nunes fires in a strike for Sporting.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
Zouhair Feddal (Sporting) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 13, It's a goal kick for the home team in Pacos de Ferreira.
Douglas Tanque of Pacos Ferreira gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Sporting at Estadio Capital do Movel.
In the minute 15, Free kick Sporting.
Sporting to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Sporting in their own half.
Fabio Verissimo signals a Sporting throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 19, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Pedro Porro (Sporting) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
In the minute 20, Sporting have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Tiago Tomas (Sporting) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sporting have been given a penalty...
In the minute 23, Douglas Tanque (Pacos Ferreira) has received a yellow card from Fabio Verissimo.
Goal! Jovane Cabral gives Sporting a 0-1 lead from the penalty spot.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Sporting's Jovane Cabral has been booked in Pacos de Ferreira.
Sporting will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira's Helder Ferreira misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 27, Fabio Verissimo awards Sporting a goal kick.
Fabio Verissimo awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Sporting.
In the minute 30, Play has been interrupted briefly in Pacos de Ferreira to check on Jovane Cabral, who is grimacing with pain.
Can Pacos Ferreira get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sporting's half?
Nuno Santos (Sporting) has replaced the possibly injured Jovane Cabral at Estadio Capital do Movel.
In the minute 33, Luther Singh (Pacos Ferreira) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira are pushing forward but Oleg Reabciuk's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 34, Sporting have a goal kick.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Sporting.
Throw-in for Sporting at Estadio Capital do Movel.
In the minute 36, Fabio Verissimo signals a Pacos Ferreira throw-in in Sporting's half.
In Pacos de Ferreira a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Wendel for Sporting has been booked by Fabio Verissimo and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 36, Attention is being given to Pacos Ferreiraâ€™s Stephen Eustaquio and play has been suspended briefly.
Stephen Eustaquio returns to the field for Pacos Ferreira after picking up a slight injury.
Sporting to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
In the minute 38, Sporting are coming forward and Tiago Tomas gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Free kick in a good position for Pacos Ferreira!
In the minute 40, In Pacos de Ferreira, Marco Baixinho of Pacos Ferreira is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
Ball safe as Sporting is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 41, Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
In the minute 44, Pacos Ferreira drive upfield and Luther Singh gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sporting defender.
Can Pacos Ferreira capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sporting's half?
Luiz Carlos of Pacos Ferreira gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Pacos de Ferreira.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Sporting goal kick.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 45, Fabio Verissimo awards the home team a throw-in.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Antonio Adan is booked for the away team.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Sporting at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fabio Verissimo signals a Pacos Ferreira throw-in in Sporting's half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Sporting in their own half.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Fabio Verissimo awards Pacos Ferreira a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Sporting have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Sporting in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira drive forward but Helder Ferreira is judged offside.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Sporting.
In the minute 59, Pedro Porro of Sporting smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Sporting's Nuno Mendes has run offside.
In the minute 60, Fernando Fonseca is replacing Uilton for the home team.
Fabio Verissimo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 61, Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
The home team have replaced Helder Ferreira with Lucas Silva. This is the second substitution made today by Pepa.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
Goal! Sebastian Coates extends Sporting's lead to 0-2.
In the minute 63, Zouhair Feddal instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira close to the penalty box.
In the minute 66, Sporting have a goal kick.
Daniel Braganca is on a sub for Luciano Vietto for Sporting.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sporting drives forward and Pedro Porro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 67, Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Ball safe as Pacos Ferreira is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira drive upfield and Luther Singh gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sporting defender.
Goal kick for Sporting at Estadio Capital do Movel.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
At Estadio Capital do Movel, Stephen Eustaquio has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Capital do Movel.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Sporting.
Throw-in for Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 78, In Pacos de Ferreira a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Pacos Ferreira make their third substitution with Adriano replacing Luiz Carlos.
In the minute 79, It's a goal kick for the home team in Pacos de Ferreira.
Andraz Sporar is replacing Tiago Tomas for Sporting at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Ruben Amorim (Sporting) is making a fourth substitution, with Vitorino Antunes replacing Pedro Porro.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Matheus Nunes (Sporting) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 81, Sporting to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 83, Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
Zouhair Feddal (Sporting) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 87, Can Pacos Ferreira get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sporting's half?
In the minute 87, Fabio Verissimo signals a Pacos Ferreira throw-in in Sporting's half.
Pepa is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Capital do Movel with Joao Pedro replacing Douglas Tanque.
The home team replace Stephen Eustaquio with Martin Calderon.
Ball safe as Pacos Ferreira is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 89, Fabio Verissimo awards the home team a throw-in.
Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Sporting in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Pacos Ferreira are pushing forward but Joao Pedro's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sporting goal kick.
Ball safe as Pacos Ferreira is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Pacos de Ferreira Pacos Ferreira attack through Luther Singh. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Sporting goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Pacos de Ferreira. The final score is 0-2.
